creator: ericrrath@fmailbox.com
text:
Add optional directives "SSLCertificateKeyFileUser", "SSLCertificateKeyFileGroup",  and "SSLCertificateKeyFilePerms", supported in same places as "SSLCertificateKeyFile".  When present, check the user, group, and/or perms of the private key file in question, and if any assertions fail, then log error, or even fail configtest/startup.

The motivation is have httpd optionally ensure private keys are not any more visible on filesytem than necessary.  This idea is borrowed from ssh's similar check on private keys.
